attributes.action: put an end to the green taxes
attributes.additional_details:
Stop putting green taxes on our energy bills.
People can not pay for  them as bills are so high.
Pensioners are going to die next winter as they can not afford to heat there homes as are many ordinary people.
This is a con just to make the PM look good in the eyes of other world leaders.
Why should we do so much when other country are not. China and India are increasing there CO2 emissions as is the US.
